title: Full Stack Developer
description: In the NFTtrace project, I worked on the Aashtha Special Train and Tejas Holi Special Train phases, contributing to frontend and backend development. I collaborated with team members to deliver high-quality solutions and meet project milestones. Additionally, I integrated Web3 technologies to enhance the project's blockchain capabilities.

title: Jr Full Stack Developer
description: I've developed the Nishania page UI, integrated the frontend for Wild Wheat Bakery, and contributed to both frontend and backend of NFTtrace. NFTtrace uses NFTs to revolutionize industries with tamper-proof, traceable digital records and authentic assets.

title: Full Stack Trainee
description: I worked on the AceTech project, handling UI development and frontend integration. I designed functional user interfaces and ensured seamless user experience, collaborating with backend developers to deliver a polished product.
